dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: A fierce dragon blocks your path. Its scales shimmer with dark, fiery hues.

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Stand aside, beast! I mean no harm!

dialogues.speaker: Dragon
dialogues.text: Why should I trust a human? Your kind has brought nothing but destruction!

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: I am not like others. I seek only peace.

dialogues.speaker: Dragon
dialogues.text: Peace? Prove your words, human. Make a pact with me.

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Very well, I agree. May this pact usher in a new era of understanding between our races.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: With a nod, the dragon steps aside. You continue your quest, hopeful for the future.
